newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Giddings & Lewis cut to sell.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Giddings & Lewis cut to sell.

text.p: -- ABN AMRO Chicago Corp said Tuesday it cut its rating on Giddings & Lewis Inc to sell from hold, advising shareholders to capture the current gain in share price caused by Harnischfeger Industries Inc's $19 a share tender offer for the company.
-- Giddings was down 15/64 at 20-1/8 Tuesday, after surging 6-23/32 Monday.

-- "We are changing our recommendation for (Giddings) to sell, given that there are a limited number of logical buyers, that (Giddings) does not have the negotiating leverage we earlier thought possible, and that the market's treatment of (Harnischfeger's) stock price may temper the enthusiasm of other potential bidders," analyst Robert McCarthy Jr. said in a research note.
-- Harnischfeger shares fell 3-1/8 to 42-1/4 Monday and were up 1-3/8 at 43-5/8 Tuesday.
